select DATEPART(YEAR, Summarydatetime) AS year,
Summarydatetime AS summarydatetime,
DATEPART(Week,Summarydatetime) AS summarydatetime,
DATEPART(Month,Summarydatetime) AS summarydatetime,
DATEPART(Quarter,Summarydatetime) AS summarydatetime,
CASE d.CardTypeID WHEN 3 THEN '学生卡' WHEN 2 THEN '老人卡' WHEN 1 THEN '成人卡' END CardTypeID, SUM(d.PayNum) PayNum,SUM(d.PayAmount) PayAmount,SUM(d.UnTopupNum) UnTopupNum,SUM(d.UnTopupAmount) UnTopupAmount, SUM(d.OldTopupOKNum) OldTopupOKNum,SUM(d.OldTopupOKAmount) OldTopupOKAmount,SUM(d.RefundNum) RefundNum,SUM(d.RefundAmount) RefundAmount, SUM(d.OldRefundNum) OldRefundNum,SUM(d.OldRefundAmount) OldRefundAmount from IC_DailySummary_Topup d
and d.SummaryDateTime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, Summarydatetime), Summarydatetime, d.CardTypeID
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, Summarydatetime), DATEPART(Week,Summarydatetime), d.CardTypeID
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, Summarydatetime), DATEPART(Month,Summarydatetime), d.CardTypeID
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, Summarydatetime), DATEPART(Quarter,Summarydatetime), d.CardTypeID
order by DATEPART(YEAR, Summarydatetime), Summarydatetime DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, Summarydatetime), DATEPART(Week,Summarydatetime) DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, Summarydatetime), DATEPART(Month,Summarydatetime) DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, Summarydatetime), DATEPART(Quarter,Summarydatetime) desc
